title: Association between dietary calcium to Phosphorus Ratio and the odds of ulcerative colitis: A case-control study
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Hadith Tangestani, Ali Jamshidi, Zahra Yari, Zahrasadat Jalaliyan, Hamid Ghalandari, Azita Hekmatdoost, Samaneh Rashvand, Amirhossein Mohammadi Baghmolae, Hadi Emamat
